property.name: 1.low
property.value: SettlementList.Any(IsAbandoned == false && FactionContext.IsEnemy) == false && ( BanditryLevel < MediumBanditryLevelThreshold || SettlementList.All(FactionContext == PlayersFaction))

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(IdleCaravanList.IsEmpty == false && IdleCaravanList.Any(IsReturning == false), IdleCaravanList.FirstContext(IsReturning == false).CharacterContext, CaravanMasterList.FirstContext.CharacterContext)

client_state_player.name: client_state_player
client_state_player.tooltip: You are a tributary state of this faction

vassal_player.name: vassal_player
vassal_player.tooltip: You are a puppet of this faction

unlocks_holder.comment: We shouldn't need this anymore but leaving for now just in case

tx_no_masters.component_level_text: There are no masters available. A new master will be available to recruit next turn.

unit_card.comment: ScottB: The ContextPropagator that passes own context to self for unit record is to make it refresh when change selection, in the event that the list itself isnt refreshed when changed character selection

component_text.text: You don't have any active convoys. Please use button Create New Convoy from the above to dispatch one.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | CurrentNodeContext.IsStartNode => 0 | CurrentNodeContext.IsEndNode => 1 | Percentage(TravelledPathNodeList.Size - 1, PathNodeList.Size + TravelledPathNodeList.Size - 2)

dy_turns.componentleveltooltip: Turns remaining until convoy completes its journey

dy_recruitment_cost.componentleveltooltip: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to recruit this character.

unit_card.comment: ScottB: The ContextPropagator that passes own context to self for unit record is to make it refresh when change selection, in the event that the list itself isnt refreshed when changed character selection

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | CurrentNodeContext.IsStartNode => 0 | CurrentNodeContext.IsEndNode => 1 | Percentage(TravelledPathNodeList.Size - 1, PathNodeList.Size + TravelledPathNodeList.Size - 2)

callback_with_context.context_object_id: CcoCampaignFactionCaravans faction_car, CcoCampaignRouteNode route, CcoCampaignCaravan caravan
